ALD.Seren package¶

Submodules¶

ALD.Seren.seren_hw module¶

Created on Jan 26, 2018

@author: Alan Buckley <alanbuckley@lbl.gov>
<alanbuckley@berkeley.edu>
class ALD.Seren.seren_hw.Seren_HW(app, debug=False, name=None)¶

Bases: ScopeFoundry.hardware.HardwareComponent

This hardware level module is responsible for establishing serial communication with the Seren RX01/LX01 Series Radio Frequency Power Supply, and defining commands to be connected to LoggedQuantities.

RF_state(status)¶

Enables or disables RF source.

Connected to LoggedQuantity self.settings.RF_enable

Arguments type Description
status bool RF emitter enabled/disbaled
RF_toggle()¶

Toggles RF enable with each call by negating the value of LoggedQuantity

self.settings.RF_enable

connect()¶
disconnect()¶

Properly disconnects logged quantities from module functions. Closes serial connection to Seren PSU.

name = 'seren_hw'¶
read_fp()¶

Reads set forward power from Seren PSU.

Connected to LoggedQuantity self.settings.forward_power_readout

Returns:(int) Forward power in Watts.
read_rp()¶

Reads reflected power from Seren PSU.

Connected to LoggedQuantity self.settings.reflected_power

Returns:(int) Reflected power in Watts.
serial_toggle(status)¶

Sets serial or front panel control.

Connected to LoggedQuantity self.settings.enable_serial

Arguments type Description
status bool Serial enabled/disabled
setup()¶
write_fp(power)¶

Writes forward power setting to Seren PSU.

Connected to LoggedQuantity self.settings.set_forward_power

Arguments type Description
power int RF power setpoint in Watts

ALD.Seren.seren_interface module¶

Created on Jan 4, 2018

@author: Alan Buckley <alanbuckley@lbl.gov>
<alanbuckley@berkeley.edu>
class ALD.Seren.seren_interface.Seren_Interface(port='COM6', debug=False)¶

Bases: object

This interface level module is responsible for establishing serial communication with the Seren RX01/LX01 Series Radio Frequency Power Supply, and defining the basic commands to be sent to the Power Supply Unit.

close()¶

Closes serial connection to Seren PSU.

cr_readline()¶

Custom readline function which reads from the serial port until the carriage return character is found. This function is called by write_cmd()

Returns:(str) Decoded byte string ending in carriage return
emitter_off()¶

Disables the RF Output.

emitter_on()¶

Enables the RF Output.

name = 'seren_interface'¶
read_forward()¶

Queries Forward Power.

Returns:(str) Forward power output, in Watts, 1 to 5 digits, 1-Watt increments.
read_reflected()¶

Queries Reflected Power

Returns:(str) Reflected power, where XXXX is the current reflected power, in Watts; length: 4 characters, fixed. Leading zeros are replaced with the blank space character.
set_analog_control()¶

Allows PSU to accept commands via its analog interface.

set_front_panel_control()¶

Allows PSU to accept commands via its physical front panel interface.

set_serial_control()¶

Allows PSU to accepts commands via its serial connection

write_cmd(cmd)¶

Sends command to Seren and queries the device for a response.

Arguments type Description
cmd str Command to be sent to the power supply over serial
Returns:(str) Response from the Seren PSU (Power Supply Unit).
write_forward(power)¶

Sets the Power Setpoint.

Arguments type Description
power int Setpoint power in Watts

psu_check()¶
